_meanings:
{@--1@} The end or completion of a 
principal sacrifice.

{@--3@} Purification by 
bathing of the sacrificer and the 
sacrificial vessels at the end of a 
sacrifice.

{@--5@} A supplementary sacrifice to 
atone for defects in a principal and
preceding one; a sacrifice in general;
{#snAtavatyavaBfTe tatastvayi#} <ls>Śi. 14. 10.</ls>
